Title: A Mech in Need
Description:
This mechsuit has seen better days. Maybe a skilled Machine Speaker could assist you. 

I know Speaker Jurlax has been assigning machinists to mechsuit maintenance lately. He probably has some advice for you.
ObjectivesText: Bring the Malfunctioning Mechsuit to Speaker Jurlax in Gundargaz.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Bring the Malfuncitoning Mechsuit to Speaker Jurlax in Gundargaz.
